1.arabic:
القلب متيم بطه النبي
وصلى وسلم على طه النبي
1.latin:
Alqolbu mutayyam bithôhannabî
Wa shollâ wasallam 'alâ Thôhân-nabî

2.arabic:
نبينا المكرم نبينا المشرف
طه العربي طه العربي
2.latin:
Nabînal mukarrom nabînal musyarrof
Thôhal 'arobî Thôhâl 'arobî

3.arabic:
أحمد هدانا والمولى قد شاء
بالخير اتانا وبالحق جاء
3.latin:
Ahmadun hadânâ walmaulâ qod syâ'
Bil khoiri atânâ wa bilhaqqi jâ'

4.arabic:
للتقوى دعانا لدرب الرجاء
والمولى اغنانا بطه النبي
4.latin:
Littaqwâ da'ânâ lidarbirrojâ'
Wal maulâ aghnânâ biThôhan-nabî

5.arabic:
يا رسول الله جئت بالقرآن
من وحي الله مولانا الرحمن
5.latin:
Yâ Rosûlallâh ji'ta bil-Qur'ãn
Min wahyil ilâh maulânâr-rohmân

6.arabic:
وبعون الله نشرت الإيمان
يا حبيب الله يا طه النبي
6.latin:
Wa bi'aunillâh nasyartal imân
Yâ habîballâh Yâ Thôhân-nabî

7.arabic:
كم يخطو فؤادي لتلك الديار
وبشوق ينادي شافعي المختار
7.latin:
Kam yakhthû fu'âdî litilkad-diyâr
Wa bisyauqin yunâdî syâfi'il mukhtâr

8.arabic:
قد طال ابتهادي عن أغلى مقام
والحج مرادي وديار النبي
8.latin:
Qod thôlabtihâdî 'an aghlâ maqôm
Wal hajju murôdî wa diyârun-nabî

text.1:
Hati terpikat kepada Thaha Nabi
Kita bershalawat dan salam kepada Thaha Nabi
text.2:
Nabi kami yang mulia, Nabi kami yang luhur
Thaha orang Arab, Thaha orang Arab
text.3:
Ahmad membimbing kami dan Tuhan telah berkehendak
Ia datang membawa kebaikan dan datang dengan kebenaran
text.4:
Ia mengajak kami kepada takwa, ke jalan harapan
Dan Tuhan memuliakan kami dengan Thaha Nabi
text.5:
Wahai Rasulullah engkau datang membawa Al-Qur'an
Dari wahyu Allah, Tuhan kami Yang Maha Pengasih
text.6:
Dengan pertolongan Allah engkau sebarkan iman
Wahai kekasih Allah wahai Thaha Nabi
text.7:
Betapa hati melangkah menuju negeri-negeri itu
Dengan rindu menyeru pemberi syafaat yang terpilih
text.8:
Telah lama usahaku jauh dari maqam yang paling mulia
Haji adalah cita-citaku dan negeri Nabi

en.name: The Heart Enamored with Taha the Prophet

text.1:
The heart is enamored with Taha the Prophet
We send prayers and peace upon Taha the Prophet
text.2:
Our honored Prophet, our exalted Prophet
Taha the Arab, Taha the Arab
text.3:
Ahmad guided us and the Lord has willed
He came to us with goodness and with truth he arrived
text.4:
He called us to piety, to the path of hope
And the Lord enriched us with Taha the Prophet
text.5:
O Messenger of Allah you came with the Qur'an
From the revelation of Allah our Lord the Most Merciful
text.6:
With Allah's help you spread faith
O beloved of Allah O Taha the Prophet
text.7:
How my heart steps toward those lands
With longing it calls my chosen intercessor
text.8:
My striving has long endured away from the most precious station
Pilgrimage is my desire and the lands of the Prophet
